code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import axios from"axios";import CartService from"./../../00-Context/CartService";var TableRow=function TableRow(props){var cartService=useContext(CartService);var removeHandler=function removeHandler(){axios.delete("http://localhost:8081/shop/api/cart/"+props.username+"/"+props.id).then(function(){props.refreshComponents();cartService.updateMe();}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};return React.createElement("tr",null,React.createElement("th",{scope:"row"},props.id),React.createElement("td",null,React.createElement("img",{src:props.image,style:{height:"5em"},alt:"Unable to load"})),React.createElement("td",null,props.title),React.createElement("td",null,React.createElement("button",{onClick:removeHandler,className:"btn btn-danger"},"Remove From Cart")));};export default TableRow;
